question: Bothriochloa pertusa, Cynodon dactylon, and Dichanthium annulatum are found in which of the following climatic zones?
explanation: The grasses found in the Moist sub-humid zone include Bothriochloa pertusa, Cynodon dactylon, and Dichanthium annulatum which grow in the transition zones. It covers the Ganga alluvial plain in Northern India.
